price: (211) Ask the Children of Israel how many a sign of evidence We have given them. And whoever exchanges the favor of Allāh [for disbelief] after it has come to him - then indeed, Allāh is severe in penalty.
arabic: سَلۡ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ كَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ ءَايَةِۭ بَيِّنَةٖۗ وَمَن يُبَدِّلۡ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: sal banī is'rāīla kam ātaynāhum min āyatin bayyinatin waman yubaddil niʿ'mata al-lahi min baʿdi mā jāathu fa-inna al-laha shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
